roleset.name: to develop, flourish
roleset.note: BLOSSOM-V NOTES: Frames file for 'blossom' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from blossom.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: As ties between academia and venture capital have blossomed in recent years , governmental fear of abuse has risen .
example.arg: ties between academia and venture capital
